page.title: 12CHURCHES IN LOUGHBOROUGH
page.content: In Loughborough there are 31 places of worship.T_here are five churches of England,St.Peter's Church, Emmanuel Church,All Saints, Holy Trinity and The Church of the Good Shepherd. There are two Roman Catholic churches, Sacred Heart Church, and St Marys Church. There are two Methodist churches, Trinity Church and Knightthorpe Church.There is also a Baptist Church and a United Reformed Church. There are 10 free churches and two other sects, the Jehovah's Witnesses and Seventh Day Adventists. There are five other faiths which have churches in Loughborough. These are necessary because people want to worship God in different ways.
